code: import React,{useState}from"react";import TopBar from"./TopBar";import Main from"./Main";import{TOKEN_KEY}from"../constants";import Login from"./Login";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[isLoggedIn,setIsLoggedIn]=useState(localStorage.getItem(TOKEN_KEY)?true:false);const logout=()=>{console.log("log out");localStorage.removeItem(TOKEN_KEY);setIsLoggedIn(false);};const loggedIn=token=>{if(token){localStorage.setItem(TOKEN_KEY,token);setIsLoggedIn(true);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"App",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TopBar,{isLoggedIn:isLoggedIn,handleLogout:logout}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Main,{isLoggedIn:isLoggedIn,handleLoggedIn:loggedIn})]});}export default App;
